article_title: Covered CA lawsuit seeks to reinstate canceled health plans
article_text:
President Barack Obama made a forceful case for human rights in Vietnam Tuesday during a speech in Hanoi and he called for the "peaceful resolution" of disputes in the South China Sea.

Obama stressed the need to uphold human rights in his remarks to t...

og.description: A Republican state senator who is running for state insurance commissioner is suing California's health benefits exchange, saying it wrongly cut off more than 1 million insurance policies and is wasting taxpayer money on useless marketing campaigns.
og.title: Covered CA lawsuit seeks to reinstate canceled health plans
